metadata.title: CVE-2021-28165 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty 7.2.2 to 9.4.38, 10.0.0.alpha0 to 10.0.1, and11.0.0.alpha0 to 11.0.1, CPU usage can reach 100% upon receiving a largeinvalid TLS frame.

criterions.comment: equinox-bundles package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
